content: We upgrade to master on our server over the weekend, and we are now getting an issue where people are getting scrolled back a few screens worth of messages, seemingly at the same time across the server
@Tim April ahh, did this happen when a bunch of messages had their topics edited?
That would fit the description of https://github.com/zulip/zulip/issues/8854
it could be, we were having trouble pinning down the conditions of what caused this
That would certainly explain it happening to many users all at the same time (has to be an event triggered by someone else)
it looks like it was mostly synchronized across all of the logged in users so that seems likely
Cool. Definitely was planning to debug that issue regardless.
i'm not convinced that issue is related now.
we just had it happen 4 times in a row
i'm not sure how to prove that but I did not see messages being edited
@Tim April hmm, interesting. Can you give any context on whether this happened in a narrow (and if so, what type?) or in the home view or what?
@Tim Abbott also, try checking the JS console for any tracebacks for the folks in question (I can tell you how to get error report emails for JS tracebacks, though those can be a bit spammy)
I think that information would help me confirm what's happening.
@Tim April no need for more debugging; I've reproduced the issue. Should have a fix tonight.

Thanks for the bug report! I got lucky and ended up finding this while debugging an only tangentially related bug, but your report was super helpful in that it helped me pay special attention when I noticed it.
thanks @Tim Abbott ! I just pushed the new code to our machines
